TextEng: Thanks for getting rid of Drawl. He's kept me here for days. Just to show me up, I guess. My name is Walters.
Text: 드롤을 처치해줘서 고마워. 며칠이나 날 여기 가둬뒀어. 날 망신시키려고 그런 거겠지. 난 월터스야.

TextEng: He used to be a friend of mine, back when I ran with the Sword Coast Boys. Never forgave me for "joining the enemy" as a guard.
Text: 예전에 검 해안의 패거리에 있을 때는 친구였어. 경비병으로 "적에 붙었다"고 절대 용서 안 해줬지.

TextEng: I AM a guard, but I used to run with the Sword Coast Boys. They never forgave me for "joining the enemy." Especially Drawl.
Text: 난 경비병이야, 하지만 예전에 검 해안의 패거리에 몸담았었어. "적에 붙었다"며 절대 용서를 안 해줬어. 특히 드롤이.

TextEng: I guess he wanted to make an example of me after he... changed. I got off lucky, I guess... not like some others...
Text: 걔가... 변한 후로 날 본보기로 삼으려 한 거 같아. 난 운이 좋았지... 다른 애들과 달리...

TextEng: Don't worry about me! Just kill that fool Drawl! Get him!
Text: 날 걱정하지 마! 저 바보 드롤이나 죽여! 해치워!

TextEng: I'll answer what I can, but we should keep it short. There are still zombies swarming the district. Killing Drawl didn't get rid of them.
Text: 대답할 수 있는 건 하겠지만, 짧게 해야 해. 아직 좀비들이 지구에 우글거려. 드롤을 죽여도 사라지진 않았거든.

TextEng: About me? All right, but we should keep this short. There are still undead swarming all over the Beggar's Nest, and killing Drawl probably didn't get rid of them.
Text: 나에 대해서? 알았어, 하지만 짧게 하자. 아직 언데드들이 거지 소굴 전체에 우글거려. 드롤을 죽여도 아마 사라지진 않았을 거야.

TextEng: I'll answer what I can. Anything to help people not end up like the others in the gang did.
Text: 대답할 수 있는 건 할게. 다른 사람들이 패거리 애들 꼴 안 나게 도울 수 있다면.

TextEng: Well, Drawl was always a jerk. He had big plans for the Sword Coast Boys becoming a mercenary company, but he was lazy. It was all talk.
Text: 뭐, 드롤은 원래 나쁜 놈이었어. 검 해안의 패거리를 용병단으로 만들겠다는 거창한 계획이 있었는데, 게을렀거든. 전부 허풍이었지.

TextEng: The only thing that changed was that he became a *powerful* jerk. He thought he was a lich or something. He was too stupid to see he was just a pawn.
Text: 달라진 건 *힘 있는* 나쁜 놈이 됐다는 것뿐이야. 자기가 리치라도 된 줄 알았어. 자신이 졸개일 뿐이란 걸 모를 만큼 멍청했지.

TextEng: He was bragging nonstop about someone. I think the name was Gulnan. I don't know what or who that is. Drawl wouldn't say.
Text: 쉴 새 없이 누군가를 자랑했어. 이름이 굴난인 것 같아. 그게 뭔지 누군지 모르겠어. 드롤이 안 말해줬거든.

TextEng: Personally, I don't think he really knew. He was just happy to be tough enough to back up his threats for once.
Text: 솔직히 걔도 잘 모른 것 같아. 그냥 처음으로 위협을 뒷받침할 힘이 생겨서 좋았던 거지.

TextEng: I do know that he'd been in contact with this Gulnan a lot, so there's got to be a link between them around here somewhere.
Text: 확실한 건 굴난이랑 자주 연락했다는 거야. 그러니 이 근처 어딘가에 둘 사이의 연결 고리가 있을 거야.

TextEng: Because it's a job with a future. Drawl promised a lot, but he never delivered. His plans never accomplished anything but petty crime.
Text: 미래가 있는 직업이니까. 드롤은 약속은 많이 했지만 지킨 적이 없어. 그놈의 계획이란 게 좀도둑질 말고는 이룬 게 없었거든.

TextEng: Since I joined the guards I'd been trying to straighten him out, but he wouldn't listen. Always looking for the easy way, no matter the long term cost.
Text: 경비병이 된 후로 걔를 바로잡으려 했는데, 말을 안 들어. 장기적인 대가가 어떻든 항상 쉬운 길만 찾았거든.

TextEng: I was patrolling near the gate to the city core. They must have noticed I'm missing, but probably can't spare anyone to look.
Text: 도시 중심부 성문 근처에서 순찰 중이었어. 내가 없어진 건 눈치챘겠지만, 찾으러 보낼 사람이 없을 거야.

TextEng: I'll have to find my way back there eventually. Dangerous with the undead, though.
Text: 결국 돌아갈 길을 찾아야 해. 언데드 때문에 위험하긴 하지만.

TextEng: Ever since I left, Drawl really tightened his grip on the Sword Coast Boys. He didn't want anyone else leaving... not alive, anyway.
Text: 내가 떠난 후로 드롤은 검 해안의 패거리를 더 꽉 쥐었어. 다른 누구도 떠나게 두고 싶지 않았지... 살아서는 못 나가게.

TextEng: A few weeks ago, I guess some of the guys tried to convince Drawl to take the gang out of the city. They wanted to try and avoid the plague.
Text: 몇 주 전, 몇몇이 드롤을 설득해서 패거리를 도시 밖으로 데려가려 했나 봐. 역병을 피하려고 했던 거지.

TextEng: Go ahead, but we should keep this short. Killing Drawl didn't do much to stop the zombies.
Text: 말해봐, 하지만 짧게 하자. 드롤을 죽여도 좀비를 막는 데는 별 도움이 안 됐거든.

TextEng: The same thing that happened to all of the boys. Drawl made some deal to become... whatever it was he became, and the rest of them were killed.
Text: 패거리 모두에게 일어난 일과 같아. 드롤이 어떤 거래를 해서... 뭐가 됐든 그렇게 됐고, 나머지는 다 죽었어.

TextEng: All the old gang... gone. I'm just glad Drawl got what he deserved in the end. Good riddance.
Text: 옛 패거리 전부... 사라졌어. 결국 드롤이 응보를 받아서 다행이야. 죽어서 잘됐어.

TextEng: I'll be here at the gate for now. I'm still a bit weak after being trapped in the warehouse.
Text: 일단 성문에 있을게. 창고에 갇혀 있어서 아직 좀 약하거든.

TextEng: I'll be staying here. I can't do much for the Sword Coast Boys in my current state. I gotta realize I'm not one of them anymore.
Text: 여기 있을게. 지금 상태로는 검 해안의 패거리를 위해 할 수 있는 게 없어. 이젠 그들 중 하나가 아니란 걸 받아들여야지.

TextEng: I'd like to get out of here, of course. I don't know if I could make it to the main gates on my own unless the zombies were taken care of.
Text: 당연히 여기서 나가고 싶어. 좀비들이 처리되지 않으면 혼자서 정문까지 갈 수 있을지 모르겠어.

TextEng: Good luck out there. I hope you fix that "Gulnan" Drawl talked about. Get some vengeance for the dead.
Text: 행운을 빌어. 드롤이 말한 "굴난"을 처리하길 바라지. 죽은 자들의 복수를 해줘.

TextEng: You think? I suppose I could try. I'm pretty weak right now but... I guess I don't have much choice.
Text: 그렇게 생각해? 시도해볼 수는 있겠지. 지금 꽤 약한데... 선택의 여지가 없는 것 같아.

TextEng: I suppose, but there are still a lot of undead swarming around. Drawl's benefactor is out there somewhere. I wish I wasn't so weak right now.
Text: 그렇겠지, 하지만 아직 언데드가 많이 우글거려. 드롤의 후원자가 어딘가에 있어. 지금 이렇게 약하지 않았으면 좋겠어.

TextEng: He's gone... I know it... Drawl is finally gone. Good riddance. He brought all my old friends down with him... The Sword Coast Boys... all dead.
Text: 걔가 사라졌어... 알아... 드롤이 드디어 사라졌어. 죽어서 잘됐어. 내 옛 친구들을 다 데리고 갔어... 검 해안의 패거리... 모두 죽었어.

TextEng: Hello to you. I hope the day finds you well. Looks like things are finally settling down in the Beggar's Nest. The undead are gone.
Text: 안녕. 좋은 하루 보내고 있길 바라지. 거지 소굴이 드디어 안정되는 것 같아. 언데드가 사라졌거든.

TextEng: Was it you that put an end to what was happening? Thanks, if it was. Is the way to the main gates safe? I'm a bit weak because of all the fighting that was going on.
Text: 일어난 일을 끝낸 게 당신이야? 그렇다면 고마워. 정문으로 가는 길이 안전해? 싸움이 많아서 좀 약해졌거든.

TextEng: Things are pretty quiet here at the gate now that the threat in this area is gone. Saves the guards a lot of worry.
Text: 이 지역의 위협이 사라져서 성문이 꽤 조용해. 경비병들 걱정이 많이 덜어졌어.

TextEng: I suppose it would be all right now. There's not too much danger now that the undead seem to be gone. Thanks for your help.
Text: 이제 괜찮을 것 같아. 언데드가 사라진 것 같으니 위험도 별로 없어. 도와줘서 고마워.

TextEng: I agree. If you were in on destroying Drawl, you know that he had far too much power for the smalltime hood that he was.
Text: 동의해. 드롤을 처치하는 데 참여했다면, 걔가 소규모 건달치고는 힘이 너무 셌다는 걸 알 거야.

TextEng: The Beggar's Nest is obviously under siege by undead. I don't know what's doing it, but it sure made a mess of the Sword Coast Boys.
Text: 거지 소굴이 언데드에게 포위당한 게 분명해. 뭐가 이러는 건진 모르겠지만 검 해안의 패거리를 박살 낸 건 확실해.

TextEng: Drawl seemed to have made some sort of deal for the power he received. He corrupted the whole gang... some used to be my friends...
Text: 드롤이 그 힘을 얻으려고 어떤 거래를 한 것 같아. 패거리 전체를 타락시켰어... 몇몇은 내 친구였는데...

TextEng: I don't know. He bragged about someone named Gulnan... said he was her "Lieutenant of Evil." I bet he gave himself the title. Adolescent garbage.
Text: 모르겠어. 굴난이라는 누군가를 자랑했어... 자기가 "악의 부관"이라고 했지. 자기가 붙인 칭호일 거야. 애들 같은 헛소리.

TextEng: Whoever or whatever Gulnan is, the two of them must have had a way to meet. Have you thoroughly checked the warehouse? Some strange things went on.
Text: 굴난이 누구든 뭐든, 둘이 만나는 방법이 있었을 거야. 창고를 샅샅이 뒤져봤어? 이상한 일이 일어났거든.

TextEng: Well, if they got some willing people, maybe they'd make better henchmen than mindless zombies. I don't know anything about undead.
Text: 뭐, 자발적으로 따르는 사람을 얻었다면 멍청한 좀비보다 나은 부하가 됐겠지. 언데드에 대해서는 아는 게 없어.

TextEng: It could be that they just wanted to cause chaos... or make people afraid that even people without the plague could turn on them...
Text: 그냥 혼란을 일으키고 싶었을 수도... 아니면 역병이 없는 사람도 돌변할 수 있다고 겁을 주려고...

TextEng: I doubt it. Drawl couldn't have been behind it all. He was an idiot. A tough one, but still an idiot. He was pure patsy.
Text: 의심스러워. 드롤이 배후일 리 없어. 바보였거든. 힘센 바보지만 여전히 바보야. 완전 호구였지.

TextEng: Stopping the zombies probably means finding this "Gulnan" creature Drawl was bragging about. Don't know anything about how to do that, though.
Text: 좀비를 멈추려면 드롤이 자랑하던 "굴난"이란 존재를 찾아야 할 거야. 어떻게 하는지는 모르겠지만.

TextEng: Thanks for getting rid of Drawl. Jerks like him are exactly why I quit the gang to become a guard. He got what he deserved for what he did to the others.
Text: 드롤을 처치해줘서 고마워. 걔 같은 놈들 때문에 패거리를 그만두고 경비병이 된 거야. 다른 애들한테 한 짓의 대가를 치른 거지.
